Uses of Interface
de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.Descriptor

  • Packages that use Descriptor 
    Package Description
    de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.edgeDetector  
    de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features  
    de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.pointDetector  

    • Uses of Descriptor in de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.edgeDetector

      Classes in de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.edgeDetector that implement Descriptor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Canny
      A configurable implementation of the Canny edge detection algorithm.
      class  DroG
      TODO comments This class make the edge extraction using DroG operator.
      class  Kernel
      Performs convolution with a given Kernel directly on this image.
      class  Kirsch
      Simple implementation of the Kirsch operator
      class  LaplaceFilter 
      class  MarrHildreth
      The Marr Hildreth edge detector uses the Laplacian of the Gaussian function to detect edges.
      class  Roberts
      Simple implementation of the Roberts(Cross)-Operator.
      class  Susan
      Implementation of the SUSAN (Smallest Univalue Segment Assimilating Nucleus) edge detector.

    • Uses of Descriptor in de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features

      Subinterfaces of Descriptor in de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  FeatureDescriptor
      Interface for a common descriptor that returns a either a single feature vector or a set / list of feature vectors.
      Classes in de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features that implement Descriptor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFeatureDescriptor
      This abstract class provides some convenient base functionalities for feature descriptors like the getter for the data (including null check) and the propery change support.
      class  CEDD
      The CEDD feature was created, implemented and provided by Savvas A.
      class  FCTH
      The FCTH feature was created, implemented and provided by Savvas A.
      class  FuzzyHistogram
      Fuzzy Color Histogram.
      class  Gabor
      Implementation of a Gabor texture features done by Marko Keuschnig & Christian Penz
      class  GrayHistogram
      Reads the 256 bin gray histogram from the Image Processor and returns it as double[].
      class  Haralick
      Haralick texture features http://makseq.com/materials/lib/Articles-Books/Filters/Texture/Co-occurence/haralick73.pdf
      class  JCD
      A joint descriptor joining CEDD and FCTH in one histogram by Savvas A.
      class  Moments
      Calculates the basic statistical moments of an image like mean, std_dev, skewness and kurtosis.
      class  PHOG
      Generates Pyramid Histograms of Oriented Gradients, first introduced in "Representing shape with a spatial pyramid kernel" (2007).
      class  RGBHistogram
      Reads the histogram from the Image Processor and returns it as double[].
      class  Sift
      This descriptor is a wrapper class for the famous SIFT algorithm proposed by David Lowe: http://www.cs.ubc.ca/~lowe/keypoints/ Related papers:
      The most complete and up-to-date reference for the SIFT feature detector is given in the following journal paper:
      David G.
      class  SURF
      Wrapper for the ImageJ SURF plugin (http://www.labun.com/imagej-surf/)
      class  Tamura
      Implementation of (three) Tamura features done by Marko Keuschnig & Christian Penz
      Changes by Ankit Jain (jankit87@gmail.com): histogram length in set string shen72@users.sourceforge.net: bugfixes in math (casting and brackets) Date: 28.05.2008 Time: 11:52:03

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PointDetector
      Interface for all intereting point detectors.
      Classes in de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.pointDetector that implement Descriptor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FASTCornerDetector
      FAST Corner Detector
      class  Harris
      Harris Corner Detection
      class  Moravec
      Moravec Corner Detector Returns a List of ImagePoint Corners.
      class  TrajkovicHedley4N
      Trajkovic and Hedley Corner Detector Returns a List of ImagePoints This Implementation does not yet use a Besenham Circle for the Points.
